firstNightReminder: Wake any Village Idiot. They point to a player. Give a thumbs up or a thumbs down. Put that Village Idiot to sleep. Repeat unitl all Village Idiots have acted.
otherNightReminder: Wake any Village Idiot. They point to a player. Give a thumbs up or a thumbs down. Put that Village Idiot to sleep. Repeat unitl all Village Idiots have acted.
name: Village Idiot
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. 1 of the extras is drunk]

firstNightReminder: The Ogre points to a player. If that player is evil, mark the Ogre with an 'Evil' reminder.
name: Ogre
ability: On your 1st night, choose a player (not yourself): you become their alignment (you don't know which) even if drunk or poisoned.

firstNightReminder: Wake the Summoner and show them three not-in-play character tokens.
otherNightReminder: If the Summoner has a 'Night 3' reminder. Wake the Summoner. They point at a player, and to a Demon icon on the character sheet. Put the Summoner to sleep. Wake the chosen player. Show the 'You are' card, the thumbs down evil sign, and the Demon token. Replace their character token with the Demon token and put the new Demon to sleep.
name: Summoner
ability: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]

name: Spirit of Ivory
ability: There can't be more than 1 extra evil player.
